flawed_nl_solution:
Tony and Dean together read 23 + 12 = <<23+12=35>>35 books
3 of these books were duplicates so Tony and Dean together read 35 - 3 = <<35-3=31>>31 unique books
All three read 31 + 17 = <<31+17=48>>48 books
Because the books are being counted three times, the book is counted 3 - 1 = <<3-1=2>>2 extra times.
All together they have read 48 - 2 = <<48-2=46>>46 different books
#### 46

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 31. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
